pageContext.geocode_address: 15711 Woodard Road, San Jose, CA 95124, USA
pageContext.public_note: This class is open for Farnham students only!
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Build and program robots using the new LEGO® Mindstorms EV3 system! Learn about mechanical and software design, loops, conditional statements, problem solving, and teamwork skills. Work in small groups, program and build your robot, and rise to the challenge. Control the robot to avoid obstacles, pick up and carry objects, and play sounds. Projects are structured so that students work in an open-ended, investigative environment while having fun.
pageContext.course_type_name: Robotics using the LEGO® EV3 System
pageContext.action_url_comment: Enrichment will start at 2:30pm when 4th and 5th graders are dismissed from school. Third graders will arrive at 2:05pm with our instructor.
